Provides working with template elements.

Imports

../core/exceptions, ../core/enums, button

Types

TElementObj = object
  case action: TElementAction
  of TElementLink:
      link: string

  of TElementPhoto:
      nil

  title, desc: string
  photo_id: string
  buttons: JsonNode

Procs

                 buttons: JsonNode = newJArray();

    raises: [], tags: [].}
Creates a new template element.

Returns template element title. Maximum 80 characters.

    tags: [].}
